h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Final Bell
content: Defeat the Wolves that guard this area, and you can find and ring the last bell in Black Wind Mountain. Doing so will allow you to be taken to a secret area with its own boss: **The Ancient Guanyin Temple**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Final Bell'.
The content is as follows:
Defeat the Wolves that guard this area, and you can find and ring the last bell in Black Wind Mountain. Doing so will allow you to be taken to a secret area with its own boss: **The Ancient Guanyin Temple**.
